definition: main engine/(military) lead aircraft/(computing) host computer/main processor/server
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The fracture of the tie bolts of the D39 main engine has been analysed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对D39主机底脚螺栓断裂事故进行了简略的分析。

sentences.english: It's very easy, in the webhosting business , to stop listening to your clients.
sentences.chinese: 它很容易，在主机空间的业务，停止听您的客户。

sentences.english: If the device finds the system holding the 'clock' line inactive, the transmission is terminated.
sentences.chinese: 如果设备发现主机系统将电平拉低，就终止传输。

sentences.english: Based on what you know, which Next Gen Console will you buy?
sentences.chinese: 根据你现在所知，你会购买那一部次世代主机？

sentences.english: The door cover of the host can be opened for convenience of cutters.
sentences.chinese: 主机门盖可打开，便于检修和刀具的更换。

sentences.english: One or more host names can be derived based on the node name of the system.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据系统的节点名导出一个或多个主机名。

sentences.english: The host list retreived from a master server uses this class to represent individual hosts.
sentences.chinese: 这是用于保存个人主机信息的数据结构。

sentences.english: No authentication of the original caller occurs within the remote object host.
sentences.chinese: 在远程对象主机中不对原调用者进行任何身份验证。

sentences.english: Create a subdomain and host all your static components there.
sentences.chinese: 创建一个子域和主机所有静态组件那里。
使用基于名字的虚拟主机。

sentences.english: You need to add virtual hosts definitions to match those ports.
sentences.chinese: 您需要添加虚拟主机定义，以匹配这些端口。

sentences.english: Usually the hard disk installation in the mainframe, therefore it in main memory.
sentences.chinese: 通常硬盘安装在主机箱内，因此它于主存储器。

sentences.english: However, you must run an appropriate server on the host.
sentences.chinese: 但是，必须在主机端运行合适的服务器。

sentences.english: We provide this service, for up to five (5) hostnames, free to the Internet community.
sentences.chinese: 你可以最多同时拥有五个主机名，免费进入在线社区。

sentences.english: M/E can be directly remote controlled from wheelhouse, monitoring room is to be arranged in E/R.
sentences.chinese: 驾驶室对主机可直接遥控，机舱内设监视室。

sentences.english: The user which connects to a virtual host using credentials.
sentences.chinese: 使用安全凭据连接到虚拟主机的用户。
